fws_master
Class ModBusWrapper

java.lang.Object
  fws_master.ModBusWrapper

public class ModBusWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

This class wraps the jaMod library. Connects to the slaves and reads the values.

Author:
Johannes Kasberger

sendRequest

private net.wimpi.modbus.msg.ModbusResponse sendRequest(net.wimpi.modbus.msg.ModbusRequest request)
Send a request to JAMod library. Opens and closes the connection each time. Otherwise the TCP Stack of the slaves seams to have problems creating a response.

Returns:
the response
